sect1.title: General
sect1.para:
The module RteLight/RteLight ASIL implements the link between SWCs and between SWCs and BSW.This module is also responsible for the timeout monitoring of PDU's. The RteLight/RteLight ASIL replaces the Rte due to several constrains:
Chorus does not have an AUTOSAR ComStack
The lib supliers are not delivering ArXML files but SSTs.

The RteLight files are clustered in several categories:
static code and generated code using xml/xsl.
Rte specific interfaces and RteLight infrastructure interfaces.
ASIL and QM interfaces. The next tree displays the way the module is organized. The leafs translate into software units. In order to increase the readability they are going to be represented as Classes, although the final product will be written in C.
